: A constellation of floating cities in the sky, with each city connected by bridges and platforms.
stardust: A constellation of sparkling stars that represent the particles that make up all matter in the universe.
cosmic dance: A constellation of swirling galaxies and nebulae that depict the dance of the universe.
time travel: A constellation of time machines and wormholes that represent the concept of traveling through time.
artificial intelligence: A constellation of robots and machines that represent the rise of artificial intelligence in the universe.
